scripts.postinstall: yarn workspace @analytics-prototyping/client-prototype build && yarn workspace @analytics-prototyping/pendo-like-overlay-prototype build
scripts.dev:dashboard: concurrently "yarn workspace @analytics-prototyping/ui-dashboard-prototyping dev" "yarn workspace @analytics-prototyping/client-prototype build -w " "yarn workspace @analytics-prototyping/pendo-like-overlay-prototype build -w " "yarn workspace @analytics-prototyping/pendo-like-overlay-prototype serve-assets"
